    Interface IController<TEntity, TKey>

    Represents a generic controller interface for CRUD operations on entities.

    Namespace: QuickKit.AspNetCore.Controllers
    Assembly: QuickKit.AspNetCore.dll
    Syntax
    public interface IController<TEntity, TKey> where TEntity : IEntity where TKey : IConvertible
    Type Parameters
    Name Description
    TEntity

    The type of the entity.
    TKey

    The type of the entity's primary key.
